meanwhile
Posted on Jun 12, 2002

tonight.. I didn’t meant o go out. I went to get my haircut.. and ended up going out with my stylist.. severn and a lot of his friends. we went to some place called inn joy. heh. it was great. I met a lot of friends there and ended up hanging out something fierce. it was a great time.

it looks like my state is gunna burn down. wtf. that is scary. maybe the apocalypse is upon us. But first read about the new abercrombie and fitch catalog. what good quality stuff.. hah.
i wanna live in los angelos. heh. I love frank black sometimes.
